form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Lee introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on the Budget

form.official-title: To repeal the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.

section.header: Repeal of Impoundment Control Act of 1974
section.text: The Impoundment Control Act of 1974 (2 U.S.C. 681 et seq.) is hereby repealed.
